body.p:
Edmund J. Shakelford -- Lieut. Col.
Richmond Ky
Octr 14th 1863
Tho E Bramlett
Gov of Ky
Dear Sir
I send you the name of Col James W Caperton who is the man to act as Colonel and John Bennett Esq who will act as Lieutenant Colonel under the State Law
Hoping you will Commission them -- and allow them at once to proceed to organize a Volunteer Company under your Order No 3 Issued from Head Quarters. Kentucky Volunteer Frankfort Ky Oct 8th 1863

Under such leaders as Col Caperton and Mr Bennett I am Satisfied the Compay will be raised -- and when raised & organized -- I will be risking nothing in saying they will contitut as much as any men in carring out your order in which you say Ky Shall be free from its Murderous foes.
They can give you my recommendation your desire -- but deem it unnecesary as you Know both the Gentlemen

Madison Cty Oct
Recm"d"
James Caperton Col
Edmund J Shackelford
Issue
Boyle
Issued, 72, 384
Madison Co Oct 14/63
Recom"d" for com"d" Officer of this country
Jas W Caperton Col
John Bennett Lt Col
Edmund J Shackelford
P Ballard
